title: Well Control Manuals
description: Comprehensive well control manual system built from industry best practices. Four volumes covering policy, procedures, equipment, and quick reference. Designed for easy customization per client and rig.

volumes.title: Policy & People
volumes.description: Barrier philosophy, safety targets, roles, certifications, training, human factors, bridging documents

volumes.title: Procedures
volumes.description: Shut-in, kill methods, stripping, tripping, HPHT, deepwater, MPD, well intervention, H2S, drills

volumes.title: Equipment & Testing
volumes.description: BOP systems, choke/kill manifolds, accumulators, MGS, diverter, rig-specific test procedures

volumes.title: Calculations & Quick Reference
volumes.description: Formulas, kill sheets, worksheets, decision trees, quick reference cards
volumes.usage: Quick lookup, rig floor reference, calculations

customizableElements: Volume 3: Rig-specific equipment and test procedures
Volume 4: Well-specific calculations from well profile data
customization.howToCustomize: Create a client config JSON in client-configs/ folder. System merges C&C master content with client overrides.

sources.note: Content synthesized from operator and drilling contractor best practices
sources.contentBlocks: Modular content in content-blocks/ folder for reuse and customization

outputFormats.description: Interactive web-based with navigation, search, offline capability
Print-ready controlled documents with revision tracking
